text: The Aiken County Sheriff's Office (ACSO) is a nationally accredited agency and the primary law enforcement agency of Aiken County, South Carolina, providing the full spectrum of policing services to the entire county. ==Uniform Patrol Division== The Uniform Patrol Division responds to calls for service, performs patrols, and provides other necessary law enforcement functions. == References == Category:Sheriffs' offices of South Carolina
title: Aiken County Sheriff's Department (South Carolina)
